text:
@SpeakerPelosi YET, NO HAZZARD PAY FOR YOUR HEROES. We are overlooked, undervalued, and unappreciated by our government. 

ESSENTIALS HAVE A CHOICE:

PLAY RUSSIAN ROULETTE WITH COVID19 OR BE HOMELESS

LOVELY HOW OUR GOVERNMENT TREAT THEIR HEROES!!!!!!

#PAYESSENTIALS
